roleset.name: to test, examine, sort, testing, examining for

example.name: all arguments
example.text: GMAC screened the card-member list for holders more than 30 years old with household incomes over $ 45,000 [*U*] who had n't `` missed any payments , '' the Buick spokeswoman says .
example.arg: holders more than 30 years old with household incomes over $ 45,000 [*U*] who had n't `` missed any payments

example.name: All args
example.text: The study showed that psychiatrists could improve their screening of teens for bipolar disorder.

roleset.note: SCREEN-V NOTES: No appropriate VN or FN. Checked by Julia, 11/2010. (from screen.01-v)

roleset.name: show a movie

example.name: roll film!
example.text: The editor also says the new producer on the film, Bruce Baird, told editors [*] to screen the picture without telling stars Sylvester Stallone and Kurt Russell or Mr. Peters.
example.arg: without telling stars Sylvester Stallone and Kurt Russell or Mr. Peters.

roleset.note: SCREEN-V NOTES: No appropriate VN or FN. Checked by Julia, 11/2010. (from screen.03-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: They insist that CFCs are damaging the earth 's stratospheric ozone layer , which-1 [] screens out some of the sun 's ultraviolet rays .
example.arg: some of the sun 's ultraviolet rays
